## LRUCache.clear() method

Clears the cache and removes all stored key-value pairs.

Does not call the eviction callback. Use \[\[evictAll\]\] to clear the cache and call the eviction callback.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
clear(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

void
